description:
Wildly popular young heartthrob Xiang Ke finally met his match after over twenty years.

Cheng Zhengyan was taller than him, a better actor than him, and even the actress that Xiang Ke liked had a crush on him.

The relationship between the two was so tense that their fans would immediately start fights upon seeing each other.

Then one day, Xiang Ke was cast in a literary film.

About a gay couple.

There were kissing scenes……there were bedroom scenes.

The other male lead……was Cheng Zhengyan.

******

Xiang Ke: My crush likes milk candy! I’ll buy it for her~

Xiang Ke: My crush likes suave and mature little wolfdogs? I’ll shave my legs and put on lotion to impress her!

Cheng Zhengyan [during a kissing scene]: Why do you taste like milk candy?

Cheng Zhengyan [during a ?? scene]: Did you shave all your leg hairs off……to seduce me?

Cheng Zhengyan [guessing]: Are you secretly in love with me?

Xiang Ke: *angry crying*>
